logger module¶

This module provides a simple logging setup function for the application.

logger.py

This module provides a simple logging setup function for the application. It configures a logger to write INFO and higher level logs to a file named 'server.log', including timestamps and log levels in each log entry.

Usage:

logger = setup_logger() logger.info("This is an info message")

logger.setup_logger()¶

Configure and return a logger instance for the application.

The logger writes INFO level and above messages to 'server.log' file, including timestamp, log level, and message in each log entry.

Usage example¶

logger = setup_logger()
logger.info("This is an info message")
